rooms.description: Entryway aligned with the main entrance in accordance to Vastu principles. Features a welcoming space with storage and a coat closet.
Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, designed in bohemian style. Incorporates indoor-outdoor flow to connect with the central courtyard.
Modern kitchen with an open layout adjoining the living area. Designed for efficient workflow and incorporates local materials.
Balcony attached to the living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows offering panoramic views. Vastu compliant orientation.

openings.description: Main entrance following Vastu guidelines to attract positive energy.
Door opening from the living area to the central courtyard.
